translations: 重新安排（reschedule 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The meeting has been rescheduled for next week.
The launch has been rescheduled for 6:51pm EDT tomorrow.
sentences.translation: 发射被重新安排在了明天的下午6点51分(美国东部夏令时间)。

sentences.sentence: Our meetings have been repeatedly rescheduled, month after month.
sentences.translation: 我们的会面已经一再改期，上月推下月。
